item.title: 美国：法国的焦虑、中国的住房问题、美国的活力
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 价格暴跌，美国农民回避买家，紧握未售出的玉米
item.description: 上个月，当玉米价格接近 4 个半月的峰值时，南达科他州农民 Eric Kroupa 接到了大量来自谷物经销商和乙醇厂的电话，要求购买锁在粮仓里的玉米。【原文：South Dakota farmer Eric Kroupa received a flurry of calls from grain dealers and ethanol plants asking to buy the corn locked away in his bins when prices neared 4-1/2-month peaks last month.】

item.title: GameStop 的粉丝们在等待股东大会的召开，此前的高需求使首次尝试脱轨
item.description: GameStop 的年会定于周一举行，在该公司众多狂热的零售投资者粉丝中，社交媒体上的讨论日益热烈。【原文：GameStop's annual meeting, scheduled for Monday, is creating a growing buzz on social media among the company's host of avid retail investor fans.】

item.title: 夏季驾驶淡季导致全球汽油炼制利润下滑
item.description: 由于夏季驾车旺季的需求低于许多炼油厂提高产量时的预期，炼油厂销售汽油的利润正在减少。【原文：Oil refiners are making less money selling their gasoline as demand during the peak summer driving season has fallen short of what they expected when many of them boosted production.】

item.title: 伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司 398 亿美元出售中国比亚迪股份
item.description: 周一的一份证券交易所文件显示，沃伦-巴菲特（Warren Buffett）旗下的投资公司伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司（Berkshire Hathaway）以 3.105 亿港元（合 3,980 万美元）的价格出售了 130 万股在香港上市的电动汽车制造商比亚迪的股票。【原文：Berkshire Hathaway, the investment company owned by Warren Buffett, has sold 1.3 million Hong Kong-listed shares of electric vehicle maker BYD for HK$310.5 million ($39.8 million), a stock exchange filing showed on Monday.】

item.title: 巴西加入放松中国对稀土产业控制的竞争行列
item.description: 随着西方经济体努力确保绿色能源和国防所用磁铁所需的金属，并打破中国在供应链中的主导地位，矿业巨头巴西雄心勃勃地要建立稀土产业。【原文：Mining giant Brazil has big ambitions to build a rare earths industry as Western economies push to secure the metals needed for magnets used in green energy and defence and break China's dominance of the supply chain.】

item.title: 中国对欧洲猪肉发起针锋相对的反倾销调查
item.description: 中国已对从欧盟进口的猪肉及其副产品展开反倾销调查，这一举措似乎主要针对西班牙、荷兰、法国和丹麦，以回应中国对其电动汽车出口的限制。【原文：China has opened an anti-dumping investigation into imported pork and its by-products from the European Union, a step that appears mainly targetted at Spain, the Netherlands, France and Denmark in response to curbs on its electric vehicle exports.】

item.title: 瑞银将计提与继承格林希尔基金相关的 9 亿美元拨备
item.description: 瑞士银行周一表示，瑞士信贷与倒闭的供应链融资公司格林希尔资本（Greensill Capital）有关联，该行预计将为此拨备约 9 亿美元。【原文：UBS expects to record a provision of around $0.9 billion, the Swiss bank said on Monday, in connection to Credit Suisse's funds linked to collapsed supply chain financing firm Greensill Capital.】

item.title: 在丰田股东大会上，所有人都在关注董事长的支持度
item.description: 丰田汽车公司董事长丰田章男在周二举行的年度股东大会上可能不会面临无法连任的危险，但股东支持率的进一步大幅下降可能会导致公司加大治理改革的力度。【原文：Toyota Motor Chairman Akio Toyoda may be in no danger of not being re-elected at the automaker's annual general meeting on Tuesday, but any further big drop in shareholder support could lead to increased action on governance reforms.】

item.title: 澳大利亚 Tabcorp 任命前 AFL 老板 Gillon McLachlan 为首席执行官
item.description: 澳大利亚博彩服务公司 Tabcorp Holdings 周一任命前澳大利亚足球联盟（AFL）老板 Gillon McLachlan 为首席执行官兼总经理。【原文：Australian gambling services firm Tabcorp Holdings on Monday appointed former Australian Football League (AFL) boss Gillon McLachlan as its chief executive and managing director.】

item.title: 经济学家对日本央行下一次加息时机的看法仍有分歧
item.description: 据路透社最新民意调查显示，在日本央行决定于下月宣布量化紧缩计划后，经济学家对日本央行下一次加息的时机仍存在分歧。【原文：Economists remain split over the timing of the Bank of Japan's next interest rate hike, according to a new Reuters poll, after the central bank's decision to announce a quantitative tightening plan next month.】

item.title: 高盛将标普 500 指数年底目标上调至 5,600 点
item.description: 高盛（Goldman Sachs）将 S&P 500 指数的 2024 年年终目标从之前的 5,200 点上调至 5,600 点，理由是五只美国超大市值科技股的盈利增长强劲，且公允价值市盈率倍数较高。【原文：Goldman Sachs has raised its 2024 year-end target for the S&P 500 Index to 5,600 from 5,200 earlier, citing strong earnings growth by five mega-cap U.S. tech stocks and a higher fair value price-to-earnings ratio multiple.】

item.title: 全球央行重新调整，2024 年的大规模宽松政策渐行渐远
item.description: 六个月前，全球主要央行都在为一个举动做准备，任何持有信用卡或希望买房或做生意的人都会为之欢呼：全球转向降低利率，这将使借贷更便宜，贷款更容易获得。【原文：Six months ago the world's major central banks were primed for a move that anyone with a credit card or hoping to buy a home or run a business would cheer: A global shift to lower interest rates that would make borrowing cheaper and loans more available across the board.】

item.title: 欧洲 法国队自摆乌龙，中国队未能欢呼雀跃
item.description: 韦恩-科尔对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望。【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Wayne Cole.】

item.title: 欧洲团体称，欧盟网络安全标签不应歧视大型科技公司
item.description: 欧洲 26 个行业组织周一警告说，拟议中的云服务网络安全认证计划（EUCS）不应歧视亚马逊、Alphabet 旗下的谷歌和微软。【原文：A proposed cybersecurity certification scheme (EUCS) for cloud services should not discriminate against Amazon , Alphabet's Google and Microsoft , 26 industry groups across Europe warned on Monday.】

item.title: 主席离婚后，SK 集团将确保关联公司免遭恶意收购
item.description: 韩国 SK 集团董事长崔泰源（Chey Tae-won）周一表示，该集团将确保他最近的离婚赔偿裁决结果不会使 SK 公司容易受到恶意收购或其他问题的影响。【原文：South Korea's SK Group Chairman Chey Tae-won said on Monday the conglomerate will make sure that the outcome of his recent divorce payment ruling does not leave SK companies vulnerable to hostile takeover or other problems.】

item.title: 中国 5 月工业产值不及预期，零售销售成为亮点
item.description: 中国 5 月份的工业产值低于预期，房地产行业依然疲软，这增加了中国政府要求政策支持以支撑经济增长的压力，但得益于假期的提振，零售销售额超出了预期。【原文：China's May industrial output lagged expectations with the property sector still weak, adding pressure on Beijing for policy support to shore up growth, but retail sales beat forecasts thanks to a holiday boost.】

item.title: 中国新房价格创近 10 年最快降幅
item.description: 周一的官方数据显示，5月份中国新房价格创下逾9年半以来的最快降幅，尽管政府努力控制供过于求的局面，并为负债累累的开发商提供支持，但房地产行业仍在苦苦寻底。【原文：China's new home prices fell at the fastest pace in more than 9-1/2 years in May, official data showed on Monday, as the property sector struggles to find a bottom despite government efforts to rein in oversupply and support debt-laden developers.】

item.title: 1-5 月中国房地产投资下滑加剧
item.description: 中国的房地产投资继1-4月下降9.8%之后，在2024年前五个月又同比下降了10.1%，尽管政策制定者加倍努力支持萎靡不振的房地产行业并支撑消费者信心。【原文：Property investment in China fell 10.1% in the first five months of 2024 from a year earlier, after dropping 9.8% in January-April, even as policymakers doubled down on efforts to support the ailing sector and shore up consumer confidence.】

item.title: 中国央行一如预期维持关键政策利率不变
item.description: 中国央行周一在展期到期的中期贷款时，一如预期维持关键政策利率不变，并从银行系统抽走了部分资金。【原文：China's central bank left a key policy rate unchanged as expected on Monday when rolling over maturing medium-term loans, and drained some funds from the banking system.】

item.title: 美元坚挺，欧元在近期低点附近徘徊；市场为中国数据做好准备
item.description: 由于对欧洲政治前景的持续担忧，欧元在一个多月低点附近徘徊，美元周一表现坚挺。【原文：The dollar was firm on Monday as the euro hovered near a more than one-month low amid continued concerns about the political outlook in Europe.】

item.title: 中国数据公布前美国消费需求疲软，油价逐步下跌
item.description: 周五的一项调查显示，美国消费者需求疲软，交易商正在等待全球最大的原油进口国中国公布关键经济数据，油价在周一亚洲早盘交易中下滑。【原文：Oil prices slipped in early Asian trading on Monday after a survey on Friday showed weaker U.S. consumer demand and as traders awaited the release of key economic data from China, the world's biggest crude importer.】

item.title: 亚洲股市为中国数据和欧元压力做准备
item.description: 周一，在一系列中国经济新闻之前，亚洲股市大多走软，而欧洲政治的不确定性则削弱了风险偏好，使欧元处于守势。【原文：Asian share markets were mostly softer on Monday ahead of a slew of Chinese economic news, while political uncertainty in Europe soured risk appetites and kept the euro on the defensive.】

item.title: 日本 4 月核心机械订单下降
item.description: 日本内阁府周一公布的数据显示，日本 4 月份的核心机械订单三个月来首次出现下降，这使人们对资本支出的力度产生了一些怀疑，而资本支出是经济持久复苏的关键。【原文：Japan's core machinery orders fell in April for the first time in three months, Cabinet Office data showed on Monday, casting some doubt about the strength of capital spending, which is key to a durable economic recovery.】

item.title: 淡马锡将向澳大利亚 ETF 管理公司 Betashares 投资最多 1.98 亿美元
item.description: 新加坡投资公司淡马锡控股公司（TEM.UL）周一表示，将向澳大利亚交易所交易基金管理公司 Betashares 投资最多 3 亿澳元（1.984 亿美元）。【原文：Singapore-based investment firm Temasek Holdings (TEM.UL) will invest up to A$300 million ($198.4 million) in Australian exchange-traded fund manager Betashares, the company said on Monday.】

item.title: 中国投资者抢购离岸资产刺激香港财富流入
item.description: 中国富豪对香港投资产品（如保险和高收益定期存款）的需求正在恢复，他们的目的是在国内经济和房地产行业下滑以及货币疲软的情况下保护收益。【原文：Hong Kong investment products such as insurance and high-yield time deposits are seeing resurgent demand from wealthy Chinese who are aiming to shield returns from a domestic economic and property sector downturn and also a weaker currency.】

item.title: 报告发现，全球受众对人工智能驱动的新闻编辑室心存疑虑
item.description: 路透社新闻研究所发布的一份报告发现，全球对在新闻制作中使用人工智能和错误信息的担忧与日俱增，这给已经在努力吸引受众的新闻编辑室带来了新的挑战。【原文：Global concerns about the use of AI in news production and misinformation are growing, a report published by the Reuters Institute for the Study of Journalism found, posing fresh challenges to newsrooms already struggling to engage audiences.】

item.title: 早间新闻应对中国数据洪峰
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 美联储卡什卡利称预测 12 月降息是 "合理 "的
item.description: 明尼阿波利斯联储主席尼尔-卡什卡利（Neel Kashkari）周日表示，"合理预测 "美国央行今年将降息一次，但要等到12月。【原文：Minneapolis Federal Reserve President Neel Kashkari on Sunday said it's a "reasonable prediction" that the U.S. central bank will cut interest rates once this year, waiting until December to do it.】

item.title: 智利称沙特矿业部长将到访，锂有望列入议程
item.description: 智利政府周六表示，沙特阿拉伯矿业部长将于 7 月访问这个拉美国家，并计划在圣地亚哥与他的同行会面。【原文：Chile's government said on Saturday that Saudi Arabia's mining minister will travel to the Latin American country in July and plans to meet with his counterpart in Santiago.】
